Html:
Hello,

How to generate EDI 270 file using the OopFactory.X12.Hipaa.Eligibility? Looks like implemented only parser part for this 270 File. But most of the time we need to create EDI 270 file and need to parse the received 271.

Is there any sample code available for this???

Thanks In advance.

Thanks & Regards.
Have you ever figured out how to accomplish this? I need to do the very same thing.

The path I took to creating a 270 was look at the test for Create837_5010Version (In OopFactory.X12.Tests.Unit.Creation namespace) and reverse engineer the concepts back to a 270.

You can see an outline of the process for creating a 270 on this page
